source: TEXT_GAIUSE106_01180_SEQ_00<tab>Minfilia has a mind to dispatch you to Revenant's Toll.
target: TEXT_GAIUSE106_01180_SEQ_00<tab>ミンフィリアは、冒険者にあるものを届けてほしいようだ。

source:
TEXT_GAIUSE106_01180_SEQ_01 This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Minfilia at the Waking Sands.

※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE106_01180_SEQ_01本クエストは調整されました。一度破棄し、砂の家の「ミンフィリア」から再受注してください。

※次のメインクエストは、「メインクエストガイド」からも確認することができます。メインクエストガイドの表示/非表示は、メインコマンドの「キャラクターコンフィグ」から「ユーザーインターフェース設定」を選び、変更してください。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE106_01180_SEQ_02<tab>Slafborn is pleased that you were the Scion chosen to represent the order in Revenant's Toll, and waggishly declares that he intends to impose the work of a dozen men upon you. Though he subsequently claims to be jesting, his wry expression leads you to suspect that your time in Mor Dhona will not be spent in idleness...
target: TEXT_GAIUSE106_01180_SEQ_02<tab>スラフボーンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88B501 /var>を渡すことができた。復興に力を貸してほしいというスラフボーン。レヴナンツトールをめぐり、困っている住人がいたら手を貸してあげよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE106_01180_TODO_00<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Minfilia at the Waking Sands.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE106_01180_TODO_00本クエストは調整されました。一度破棄し、
砂の家のミンフィリアから再受注してください

source: TEXT_GAIUSE106_01180_MINFILIA_000_000<tab>Do you ever wonder how he does it? Alphinaud, I mean. It was almost predictable that he should appear with an emissary of the Adventurers' Guild mere moments after I had expressed the need to forge ties between our organizations. Truly, his sense of timing rivals even your own...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE106_01180_MINFILIA_000_000移転を決めた途端、アルフィノから実務を山ほど渡されたわ。
まったく、彼の手際の良さには感心するわね。
……先見の明？　それとも、一日の長なのかしら？

source: TEXT_GAIUSE106_01180_MINFILIA_000_001<tab>Setting such mysteries aside for the present─I have two tasks for you.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE106_01180_MINFILIA_000_001ともかく、わたしもタタルさんも賢者のみんなも手一杯。
あなたにも、ひとつ頼まれてほしいの。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE106_01180_MINFILIA_000_002<tab>First, I would like you to deliver these documents to Slafborn. They concern our forthcoming move. Second─and this is the more onerous task─I would have you place yourself at his disposal, in accordance with the agreement between ourselves and the Adventurers' Guild. Represent us well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE106_01180_MINFILIA_000_002この「」を
レヴナンツトールのスラフボーンさんに届けてくれるかしら？
大事な書類だから、失くさないように気を付けてね。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE106_01180_SLAFBORN_000_010<tab>I was told to expect a Scion, but I didn't expect it to be you. It has been far too long, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You have something for me, yes?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE106_01180_SLAFBORN_000_010こんな辺境の……と、お前か、冒険者。
「暁」からの連絡を待っているのだが……
もしや、お前がその連絡役かな？

source: TEXT_GAIUSE106_01180_SLAFBORN_000_011<tab>Let's see, now... Yes, everything appears to be in order.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE106_01180_SLAFBORN_000_011……ふむ、ようやく来たか。
たしかに受け取ったぞ。
これでキャンプ復興へ取りかかれる。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE106_01180_SLAFBORN_000_012<tab>You'll be staying with us for a while, yes? Excellent. Would that we had a dozen more like you. Since we don't, though, we'll just give you the work of a dozen men. Heh! I jest, I jest... Well, you'll see soon enough.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE106_01180_SLAFBORN_000_012復興にあたっては、障害も多いだろう。
このレヴナンツトールでも、いろいろと準備をしなければな。
助力を期待しているぞ、冒険者。
